The Orphan Trains of Nebraska

Theresa Gies

  1. Foster Name: Theresa
  2. Foster Family: Henry and Agnes Winkler
  3. Location of Family: Atkinson, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  5. Arrival Place: Unknown
  6. Age on Arrival: Unknown
  7. Date of Birth: 1912-01-10, Wappinger Falls, NY
  8. Gender: female
  9. Notes: In the 1920 census, no children lived in the Winklers' household. Henry Winkler died in 1928, and his wife Agnes died in 1935. In the 1930 census, there is a Theresa Winkler b. 1912 in NY married to Joseph Winkler, living very close to widowed Agnes Winkler; that may be her.
  10. Source: Henry and Agnes Winkler gravestones, Saint Joseph's Cemetery, Atkinson, NE; 1920 United States Federal Census
